title: Is there a term for more than tilted?
body:
I had a guy with a 38% winrate over 127 games on my team..... 

what do you even call that?

he was spanish and very angry based on his broken English and INTing behavior....

what does one call someone after they've passed the point of INTing into the dark side of the world? 

like... I don't even know how a human being could be so upset at the world as this mundo top was.....

never have I ever seen such tilt... what is after tilt and INTing?
